mario.definition_en: To increase speed or cause something to move faster.
mario.example_zh: "Mario accelerates off the starting grid to grab the lead."

mario.definition_en: A powered aircraft that is lighter than air; a flying vessel.
mario.example_zh: "Race through Airship Fortress high above the clouds!"

mario.definition_en: A tropical fruit; in Mario Kart, a peel used as a trap on the track.
mario.example_zh: "Drop banana peels to make your rivals slip and spin!"

mario.definition_en: A fight or contest between opponents; a competitive game mode.
mario.example_zh: "Compete in Balloon Battle to pop your rivals' balloons!"

mario.definition_en: A sandy or pebbly shore beside a body of water.
mario.example_zh: "Race along the sunny shores of Peach Beach!"

mario.definition_en: A squid-like creature that sprays ink to block opponents' vision.
mario.example_zh: "The Blooper splashes ink all over your screen!"

mario.definition_en: An explosive device; in Mario Kart, a Bob-omb that creates a large explosion.
mario.example_zh: "Wario throws bob-ombs to blast through the competition!"

mario.definition_en: To increase or improve something; in racing, a sudden increase in speed.
mario.example_zh: "Get a boost start by timing your acceleration perfectly!"

mario.definition_en: A projectile shot from a weapon; transforms racer into high-speed missile.
mario.example_zh: "Transform into a Bullet Bill and fly past everyone!"

mario.definition_en: A large fortified building from medieval times; a stronghold.
mario.example_zh: "Bowser's Castle is the most dangerous track!"

mario.definition_en: A difficult task or problem that tests one's abilities.
mario.example_zh: "Every cup presents a new challenge to overcome!"

mario.definition_en: A person who has defeated all opponents in a competition.
mario.example_zh: "Mario becomes the racing champion once again!"

mario.definition_en: A person in a game, story, or play; a playable figure.
mario.example_zh: "Choose your favorite character to race with!"

mario.definition_en: A closed track or path for racing; a circular route.
mario.example_zh: "Mario Circuit is a classic racing track loved by fans."

mario.definition_en: A flat, round piece of metal used as money; in Mario Kart, increases top speed.
mario.example_zh: "Collect coins to increase your kart's maximum speed."

mario.definition_en: A dry, sandy region with little rainfall and sparse vegetation.
mario.example_zh: "Navigate through Desert Hills' challenging sand dunes."

mario.definition_en: To slide sideways in a controlled manner, especially while cornering at high speed.
mario.example_zh: "Mario performs a perfect drift around the tight corner."

mario.definition_en: A light covering that forms the outer covering of a bird; allows jumping.
mario.example_zh: "Use the feather to jump over obstacles on the track!"

mario.definition_en: To bring to an end; to complete; the final point of a race.
mario.example_zh: "Cross the finish line to complete the race!"

mario.definition_en: A colorful plant bloom; in Mario Kart, a special power-up item.
mario.example_zh: "Grab the Fire Flower to shoot fireballs at opponents!"

mario.definition_en: A mushroom-like enemy creature from the Mario universe.
mario.example_zh: "Avoid the Goombas walking on the race course!"

mario.definition_en: A tool with a heavy head for pounding; an offensive item in racing.
mario.example_zh: "Throw hammers to knock out racers ahead of you!"

mario.definition_en: A device that makes a loud sound; protects from incoming shells.
mario.example_zh: "Blast the Super Horn to deflect the Spiny Shell!"

mario.definition_en: To push oneself off the ground or another surface; to leap.
mario.example_zh: "Perform a jump boost over ramps for extra speed!"

mario.definition_en: The person who is ahead of others; one who guides or directs.
mario.example_zh: "Luigi takes the lead in the final lap!"

mario.definition_en: A flash of bright light in the sky during a storm; in Mario Kart, strikes all opponents.
mario.example_zh: "Lightning shrinks all other racers temporarily!"

mario.definition_en: A large natural elevation of land rising high above its surroundings.
mario.example_zh: "Choco Mountain features steep climbs and sharp turns."

mario.definition_en: A type of fungus; in Mario Kart, an item that provides a speed boost.
mario.example_zh: "Use a mushroom to boost past your opponents!"

mario.definition_en: To move ahead of another competitor, especially on a racetrack.
mario.example_zh: "Bowser overtakes Wario with a perfectly timed Red Shell."

mario.definition_en: A flightless seabird; appears as an obstacle or character in icy tracks.
mario.example_zh: "Watch out for penguins sliding across the frozen track!"

mario.definition_en: A daughter of a monarch; a female member of a royal family.
mario.example_zh: "Princess Peach is an elegant and skilled racer."

mario.definition_en: A competition of speed; to compete against others to finish first.
mario.example_zh: "Luigi enters the VS race to prove his racing skills."

mario.definition_en: A multicolored arc in the sky caused by light refraction in water droplets.
mario.example_zh: "Rainbow Road is the ultimate challenge for racers!"

mario.definition_en: A person competing with another for the same objective or superiority.
mario.example_zh: "Bowser is Mario's biggest rival on the race track."

mario.definition_en: A paved way for vehicles and pedestrians to travel.
mario.example_zh: "Roads connect all the courses in Mario Kart World."

mario.definition_en: A hard protective outer covering, especially in Mario Kart, a weapon item.
mario.example_zh: "Bowser throws a red shell to hit the racer ahead."

mario.definition_en: The rate at which something moves or operates; rapidity of motion.
mario.example_zh: "Increase your speed with a mushroom power-up!"

mario.definition_en: A large venue for sporting events with spectator seating.
mario.example_zh: "Peach Stadium hosts exciting kart races."

mario.definition_en: A celestial body; in Mario Kart, a power-up that grants invincibility.
mario.example_zh: "Rosalina grabs a super star and becomes invincible."

mario.definition_en: A test of ability or endurance; racing alone to beat the best time.
mario.example_zh: "Race in Time Trial mode to set a new record!"

mario.definition_en: A prize or memento awarded to a winner, typically a decorative object.
mario.example_zh: "Win the Grand Prix to earn the golden trophy!"

mario.definition_en: A sudden burst of extra speed triggered by items or track features.
mario.example_zh: "A Dash Panel gives Yoshi a turbo boost down the neon straightaway."

mario.definition_en: Success in a contest or battle; the act of defeating an opponent.
mario.example_zh: "Celebrate your victory with the Star Cup trophy!"

zelda.definition_en: An unusual, exciting, and possibly dangerous activity or experience.
zelda.example_zh: "Link embarks on an epic adventure across Hyrule."

zelda.definition_en: Belonging to the very distant past; very old or aged.
zelda.example_zh: "Ancient shrines hold the secrets of the past."

zelda.definition_en: A person who shoots with a bow and arrows, especially at a target for sport.
zelda.example_zh: "Link is a skilled archer with perfect aim."

zelda.definition_en: A projectile with a pointed tip, designed to be shot from a bow.
zelda.example_zh: "Link fires arrows with precision at distant targets."

zelda.definition_en: A sustained fight between armed forces; a prolonged struggle or conflict.
zelda.example_zh: "Link engages in battles against dangerous monsters."

zelda.definition_en: A warm-blooded animal with feathers, wings, and a beak that typically can fly.
zelda.example_zh: "A flock of birds flies across the vast sky of Hyrule."

zelda.definition_en: A common goblin-like monster found throughout Hyrule.
zelda.example_zh: "Bokoblins are one of the most common enemies Link encounters."

zelda.definition_en: The air taken into or expelled from the lungs; a slight movement of air.
zelda.example_zh: "The Breath of the Wild represents freedom and life in nature."

zelda.definition_en: A structure carrying a road or path over a river, road, or other obstacle.
zelda.example_zh: "The Bridge of Hylia spans across a vast canyon."

zelda.definition_en: An event causing great and often sudden damage or distress; a disaster.
zelda.example_zh: "Calamity Ganon brought destruction to the kingdom of Hyrule."

zelda.definition_en: A deep, narrow valley with steep sides, often carved by a river.
zelda.example_zh: "The Gerudo Canyon leads to the desert region."

zelda.definition_en: A large fortified building or group of buildings with thick walls, typically from the medieval period.
zelda.example_zh: "Hyrule Castle is the heart of the kingdom."

zelda.definition_en: A person who fights or speaks publicly in support of a cause; a warrior of exceptional skill.
zelda.example_zh: "The four Champions were chosen to pilot the Divine Beasts."

zelda.definition_en: A steep rock face, especially at the edge of the sea or a mountain.
zelda.example_zh: "Link climbs steep cliffs to reach new areas."

zelda.definition_en: To go up or ascend, especially by using the hands and feet.
zelda.example_zh: "Link can climb almost any surface in Hyrule."

zelda.definition_en: A visible mass of water droplets or ice crystals suspended in the atmosphere.
zelda.example_zh: "Clouds drift across the sky above Hyrule."

zelda.definition_en: A person or animal with whom one spends time or travels; a partner or friend.
zelda.example_zh: "A loyal horse is Link's faithful companion."

zelda.definition_en: The practice or skill of preparing food by combining, mixing, and heating ingredients.
zelda.example_zh: "Link improves his cooking skills to create powerful dishes."

zelda.definition_en: The ability to do something that frightens one; strength in the face of pain.
zelda.example_zh: "Link embodies the spirit of courage."

zelda.definition_en: A barren area of land with little precipitation and extreme temperatures.
zelda.example_zh: "The Gerudo Desert is harsh and unforgiving."

zelda.definition_en: A magical or medicinal potion that heals or grants special abilities.
zelda.example_zh: "Link brews elixirs to restore health and gain temporary powers."

zelda.definition_en: A small magical being with wings that can restore health.
zelda.example_zh: "Fairies can revive Link if he falls in battle."

zelda.definition_en: An open area of land, especially one planted with crops or used for grazing.
zelda.example_zh: "Hyrule Field is a vast open area to explore."

zelda.definition_en: The seed-bearing part of a plant, often brightly colored and with a sweet scent.
zelda.example_zh: "The Silent Princess is a rare and beautiful flower."

zelda.definition_en: A large area covered with trees and plants; a woodland.
zelda.example_zh: "Dense forests cover much of Hyrule's landscape."

zelda.definition_en: A race of warrior women living in the desert region of Hyrule.
zelda.example_zh: "The Gerudo people have their own language and customs."

zelda.definition_en: A race of large, rock-eating people who live in volcanic regions.
zelda.example_zh: "The Gorons are known for their strength and mining skills."

zelda.definition_en: A defender, protector, or keeper; something that watches over or protects.
zelda.example_zh: "Ancient Guardians patrol the ruins of Hyrule Castle."

zelda.definition_en: A person admired for courage, noble qualities, and outstanding achievements.
zelda.example_zh: "Link is the hero destined to save Hyrule."

zelda.definition_en: A giant cyclops-like monster that sleeps during the day.
zelda.example_zh: "The Hinox wears weapons around its neck like a necklace."

zelda.definition_en: A large four-legged animal used for riding and carrying loads.
zelda.example_zh: "Link tames wild horses in the open fields."

zelda.definition_en: A building for people to live in, typically for one family.
zelda.example_zh: "Traditional houses in Kakariko Village have unique architecture."

zelda.definition_en: An act of traveling from one place to another; an adventure or experience.
zelda.example_zh: "Link's journey across Hyrule is full of discoveries."

zelda.definition_en: To push oneself off the ground using the legs and feet.
zelda.example_zh: "Enemies can jump to attack from above."

zelda.definition_en: A small forest spirit in the shape of a wooden creature with leaves.
zelda.example_zh: "Finding all the Koroks hidden across Hyrule is a great challenge."

zelda.definition_en: A traditional story sometimes popularly regarded as historical but not authenticated.
zelda.example_zh: "The Legend of Zelda has been passed down through generations."

zelda.definition_en: A reptilian monster that is agile and attacks with weapons.
zelda.example_zh: "Lizalfos can camouflage themselves in certain environments."

zelda.definition_en: A powerful centaur-like creature that is one of the most dangerous enemies in Hyrule.
zelda.example_zh: "Lynels are incredibly tough and require skill to defeat."

zelda.definition_en: A large pig-like monster that is stronger than Bokoblins.
zelda.example_zh: "Moblins wield heavy weapons and deal massive damage."

zelda.definition_en: A large natural elevation of the earth's surface rising to a summit.
zelda.example_zh: "Link climbs high mountains to explore new regions."

zelda.definition_en: A naturally occurring solid material from which a metal or valuable mineral can be extracted.
zelda.example_zh: "Link mines ore deposits to collect valuable materials for crafting."

zelda.definition_en: A lightweight, free-flying, foot-launched aircraft with no rigid structure.
zelda.example_zh: "The paraglider allows Link to glide safely from high places."

zelda.definition_en: An area of fairly level high ground.
zelda.example_zh: "Link begins his adventure on the Great Plateau."

zelda.definition_en: The daughter of a monarch; a female member of a royal family.
zelda.example_zh: "Princess Zelda possesses the power to seal away darkness."

zelda.definition_en: A long or arduous search for something; a journey made in search of something.
zelda.example_zh: "Link's quest is to defeat Ganon and save Princess Zelda."

zelda.definition_en: A large natural stream of water flowing in a channel to the sea, a lake, or another river.
zelda.example_zh: "Many rivers flow through the diverse lands of Hyrule."

zelda.definition_en: The ground along the edge of a river.
zelda.example_zh: "The Riverside Stable is located near a peaceful river."

zelda.definition_en: A mystical symbol or letter with magical powers used in ancient writing.
zelda.example_zh: "Link's Sheikah Slate has various rune abilities like bombs and magnesis."

zelda.definition_en: The currency used throughout Hyrule for trading and purchasing items.
zelda.example_zh: "Link collects rupees to buy equipment and supplies from merchants."

zelda.definition_en: An ancient race of people known for their advanced technology and loyalty to the Royal Family.
zelda.example_zh: "The Sheikah created advanced technology 10,000 years ago."

zelda.definition_en: A broad piece of armor held for protection against weapons or blows.
zelda.example_zh: "Link uses his shield to block enemy attacks."

zelda.definition_en: A place regarded as holy because of its associations with a divinity or sacred person or relic.
zelda.example_zh: "Link must complete trials in 120 shrines scattered across Hyrule."

zelda.definition_en: The region of the atmosphere seen from the earth; the upper air.
zelda.example_zh: "The sky over Hyrule changes from dawn to dusk."

zelda.definition_en: Frozen water vapor that falls from clouds as white flakes.
zelda.example_zh: "Link travels through snowy mountains in his quest."

zelda.definition_en: The non-physical part of a person; the essence of life and consciousness.
zelda.example_zh: "The Forest of Spirits is a mystical place."

zelda.definition_en: A building where horses are kept and cared for.
zelda.example_zh: "Link can register his horses at any stable across Hyrule."

zelda.definition_en: To be in an upright position on the feet; to be situated or located.
zelda.example_zh: "Link stands before the legendary Master Sword."

zelda.definition_en: A violent disturbance of the atmosphere with strong winds and rain, thunder, or lightning.
zelda.example_zh: "Storms can be dangerous during mountain climbing."

zelda.definition_en: The time when the sun disappears below the horizon in the evening.
zelda.example_zh: "The sunset over Hyrule creates a breathtaking view."

zelda.definition_en: To move through water by moving the body or parts of the body.
zelda.example_zh: "Link swims across rivers and lakes on his journey."

zelda.definition_en: A weapon with a long metal blade and a hilt with a handguard, used for thrusting or striking.
zelda.example_zh: "The Master Sword is the legendary blade of evil's bane."

zelda.definition_en: A building devoted to the worship of a god or gods; a sacred place.
zelda.example_zh: "The Temple of Time stands as an ancient monument."

zelda.definition_en: A tall, narrow building or structure that rises high into the air.
zelda.example_zh: "Climbing towers reveals the map of each region."

zelda.definition_en: A woody perennial plant with a trunk and branches, typically growing to a considerable height.
zelda.example_zh: "Link chops trees to gather wood for crafting."

zelda.definition_en: A test of abilities, endurance, or patience; a difficult experience.
zelda.example_zh: "The Master Trials test Link's combat skills."

zelda.definition_en: A small community or group of houses in a rural area, smaller than a town.
zelda.example_zh: "Hateno Village is a peaceful settlement in Hyrule."

zelda.definition_en: A brave or experienced soldier or fighter; a person engaged in warfare.
zelda.example_zh: "Daruk is a mighty Goron warrior."

zelda.definition_en: An uncultivated, uninhabited, and inhospitable region; wild and natural land.
zelda.example_zh: "Explore the vast wilderness of Hyrule and discover its secrets."

zelda.definition_en: The quality of having experience, knowledge, and good judgment.
zelda.example_zh: "Princess Zelda possesses great wisdom and knowledge."

zelda.definition_en: A wild carnivorous mammal that lives and hunts in packs.
zelda.example_zh: "Wolf Link accompanies Link on his adventure."

zhanglinghe.definition_en: A disturbed state of mind characterized by restlessness, illusions, and incoherence; an acutely confused state of consciousness.
zhanglinghe.example_zh: "Between desire and despair, he wandered in a delirium of love."

zhanglinghe.definition_en: A dark area or shape produced by something blocking the light; a person or thing that follows or accompanies someone constantly.
zhanglinghe.example_zh: "In the palace, everyone lives in the shadow of power and fate."
